resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108490</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108490</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fact or Opinion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tatsache oder Meinung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fait ou opinion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fato ou opinião</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fatto o opinione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονός ή Γνώμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hecho u opinión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will analyze the distinction between fact and opinion and the ways they can be employed to support viewpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer analysieren die Unterscheidung 
zwischen Tatsache und Meinung und die Methoden, die sie beschäftigt 
werden können, um Veranschaulichung zu unterstützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants analyseront la distinction entre le
fait et l'opinion et les voies qu'ils peuvent être employés pour 
supporter le point de vue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes analisarão a distinção entre o 
fato e a opinião e as maneiras que podem ser empregados para suportar
o viewpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi analizzeranno la distinzione fra il 
fatto ed opinione ed i modi che possono essere impiegati per sostenere
il punto di vista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αναλύσουν τη διάκριση μεταξύ του 
γεγονότος και της άποψης και των τρόπων που μπορούν να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν για να υποστηρίξουν την άποψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes analizarán la distinción entre 
el hecho y opinión y las maneras que pueden ser empleados para 
utilizar punto de vista.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108490</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/fact-or-opinion</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
